taskBoard

Class OptionSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • taskBoard.OptionSet

  • public class OptionSet
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates an option set instance to group multiple options

    • Constructor Detail

      • OptionSet

        public OptionSet(Prefix prefix,
                 Multiplicity multiplicity,
                 java.lang.String setName,
                 int minData,
                 int maxData,
                 java.lang.String setDescription)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        prefix - The character in front of the option keyword, set in Options class
        multiplicity - the number of times an option keyword could be occurred in predefined option set, set in Options class
        setName - The given set name, set in Options class
        minData - The minimum numbers of data items (without prefix) in predefined command line, set in Option class
        maxData - The maximum numbers of data items (without prefix) in predefined command line, set in Option class
        setDescription - Description of this set, set in Option class

    • Method Detail

      • addOption

        public OptionSet addOption(java.lang.String keyWord,
                           Separator separator,
                           boolean value,
                           Multiplicity multiplicity)
        Add a value option with the given keyWord, separator, and multiplicity, and data items, and the prefix
        Parameters:
        keyWord - The key word for an option
        separator - The character separate each argument
        value - Whether or not there is data item after key word
        multiplicity - The number of times an option key word could be occurred in a single command
        Returns:
        The option set instance itself (to support invocation chaining for addOption() methods)

      • addOption

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Parameters:
